overview.en: BCAB adopts the mode of combining gold standard income and currency standard appreciation to start the market. It is humanized to adopt the mode of going in and out as soon as possible to ensure the safety of the funds stored. It has a professional management team of market value and currency value to make fund leverage, so that it has a huge room for appreciation! Zoomlion digital bank is the first choice for storing digital currency and the future of digital currency.
overview.zh: 中联数字银行采用金本位收益和币本位增值相结合的模式启动市场，人性化让采用随进随出，保证储存资金安全，拥有专业的市值币值管理团队做资金杠杆，让获得有巨大升值空间！中联数字银行是储存数字货币的首选，是数字货币的未来之选。
